parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the basic GA instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

>  If you do not set this parameter, **ClientToken** is set to the value of **RequestId**. The value of **RequestId** for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the basic GA instance.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the basic GA instance.

The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length and can contain digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start with a letter.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the basic GA instance belongs. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.
